00021 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileVersion.h"
00022 //
00023 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CELData.h"
00024 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/CelFileReader.h"
00025 //
00026 #include "file/CELFileData.h"
00027 //
00028 
00029 using namespace affxcel;
00030 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00031 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00032 using namespace affymetrix_cel_converter;
00033 
00034 /*
00035  * Check if the input file is a Calvin file.
00036  */
00037 static bool IsCalvinCELFile(const char *fileName)
00038 {
00039         CelFileData data;
00040         CelFileReader reader;
00041         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00042         try
00043         {
00044                 reader.Read(data);
00045                 data.Clear();
00046                 return true;
00047         }
00048         catch (affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException)
00049         {
00050         }
00051         catch (...)
00052         {
00053         }
00054         return false;
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 /*
00059  * Open the file as a Calvin file first then try as a GCOS file.
00060  */
00061 CELFileVersionType CELFileVersion::DetermineCELFileVersion(const char *fileName)
00062 {
00063         if (IsCalvinCELFile(fileName) == true)
00064         {
00065                 return Calvin_Version1;
00066         }
00067 
00068         CCELFileData cel;
00069         cel.SetFileName(fileName);
00070         if (cel.IsXDACompatibleFile() == true)
00071         {
00072                 return GCOS_Version4;
00073         }
00074 
00075         if (cel.IsVersion3CompatibleFile() == true)
00076         {
00077                 return GCOS_Version3;
00078         }
00079 
00080         return Unknown_Version;
00081 }
